page.services.welcome.subtitle: I am committed to defining for you, maintainable digital solutions, scalable, efficient and secure to better meet your needs.
page.services.welcome.subtitle2: Thanks to the variety and versatility of my talented employees, we can intervene and follow from A to Z on all your projects. Let's do it !

section.contact.title: Work with me
section.contact.text: Letâ€™s work together to build something great.

section.culture.title:
My culture,
values and
belief
section.culture.performance.title: #Organization
section.culture.performance.text: Organization is a very important thing for a project to develop properly. That's why we propose a preprod that will allow you to follow the progress of the project and a ticketing system for a better understanding of each task
section.culture.maintenance.title: #Multifunction
section.culture.maintenance.text: Having a range of skills and associations will enable me to offer you project management from A to Z
section.culture.security.title: #Performance #Security #Maintenance
section.culture.security.text: These are the 3 most important concepts in the development of a project so I try to find a balance between the 3

section.myJob.title: My job
section.myJob.text: My job is not just to create pretty web concepts that are similar to you, our job is also to make sure your product is online is more efficient, secure and more scalable possible. Your product must convert. Your product must differentiate you. That's where i come in.

section.skills.title: My technos
section.skills.text: Here is a panel of techno to succeed at best all of your projects.

section.vision.title: Dimitri Vildina
section.vision.text: Just out of a master CTO tech lead, we decided with 2 associates to create a freelance association. We offer web services of all types (web applications, showcase sites, e-commerce sites, APIs). Curious and passionate about new technologies and technical issues, we would make a great network of talented people to create and build high quality digital solutions to meet your needs. Don't hesitate to challenge us, we will be delighted to accompany you !
